page.title: 05Childrens clothes in Leiston
page.content: Childrens clothes are mostly made of man made fibres.Some of these are,nylon ,acrilic,polyester and terylene.These are very convenient because they wash easily and you dont have to iron them, but some cotton and wool are still used. Most boys and girls like to wear jeans or long trousers.Lots of children and like to wear t-shirts.These t-shirts sometimes have pictures like a horses head and some have writing like RELAX! while others have patterns on them.Track-suits were invented for sport.But they are so comfortable that children wear them all the time.The same thing happened with trainer shoes because they were comfortable and cheap.Children wear them all the time. Outside if the weather is cold most children like to wear warm padded jackets with hoods.
